mapper.select: SELECT M.STREET_NAME X,A.NUM 正常,B.NUM 隐患 FROM( SELECT STREET_NAME from BLK_SANXIAO_PLACE WHERE STREET_NAME is not null GROUP BY STREET_NAME UNION SELECT STREET_NAME from BLK_SANXIAO_PLACE WHERE STREET_NAME is not null GROUP BY STREET_NAME)M LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) NUM ,STREET_NAME FROM BLK_SANXIAO_PLACE WHERE STREET_NAME is not null GROUP BY STREET_NAME)A ON M.STREET_NAME = A.STREET_NAME LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) NUM ,STREET_NAME FROM BLK_SANXIAO_PLACE WHERE STREET_NAME is not null and HAS_TROUBLE = '1' GROUP BY STREET_NAME)B ON M.STREET_NAME = B.STREET_NAME
